_PAGE_FILTER_FILE_SIZE_ARGUMENTS_:
# Arguments:  
value (Number): The size to be converted.
[units="kb"] (String): The desired unit for the size. Possible units are "b" (Bytes), "kb" (Kilobytes), "mb" (Megabytes), "gb" (Gigabytes), "tb" (Terabytes), "pb" (Petabytes), "eb" (Exabytes), "zb" (Zettabytes), "yb" (Yottabytes).
[sourceUnits="b"] (String): The unit of the original size. Possible units are the same as for units.
[digits=2] (Number): The number of decimal places in the formatted string
_PAGE_FILTER_FILE_SIZE_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterFileSize converts a size from a source unit (for example, Bytes) to a target size with a specific unit (for example, Kilobytes, Megabytes) and returns the result as a formatted string.
